title: FSCI Painting Exhibition
text:
Preface
This is a Quarto book.
To learn more about Quarto books visit https://quarto.org/docs/books.

title: Paintings catalogue FSCI
text:
Objective: Make a selection paintings for the exhibition catalogue to be selected from Wikidata and rendered multi-format in Quarto.
The below Python code uses SPARQLWrapper to retrieve data from Wikidata based on a SPARQL query.
Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q116968112
Made from material(s):
Location: Alte Pinakothek
Genre(s): mythological painting
Depicts: Cupid, Venus
Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q22116973
Creator: Franz von Lenbach
Inventory number: 11428
Made from material(s): oil paint, canvas
Location: Bavarian State Painting Collections
Genre(s): mythological painting
Depicts: Venus

Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q2393412
Creator: Jacopo Tintoretto
Inventory number: 9257
Made from material(s): oil paint, canvas
Location: Alte Pinakothek
Genre(s): nude, mythological painting
Depicts: tessellation, bed sheet, body armor, crown glass, specular reflection, loincloth, sitting, pubic hair removal, standing, lying, mirror image, male toplessness, titian hair, drapery, clothed male, naked female, white hair, cushion, Mars, dog, woman, boy, Vulcan, Cupid, blanket, man, breast, nudity, waist-length hair, mirror, window, Aphrodite, Ares, bed, beard, wall, navel, Hephaestus, Venus, Eros, mattress, bedroom, bracelet

Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q29477226
Creator: Jacopo Amigoni
Inventory number: 2857
Made from material(s): oil paint, canvas
Location: Bavarian State Painting Collections
Genre(s): mythological painting
Depicts: Venus, Adonis

Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q29480565
Creator: Heinrich Bollandt
Inventory number: 5465
Made from material(s): oil paint, lime panel
Location: Alte Pinakothek
Genre(s): mythological painting
Depicts: Venus

Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q29871397
Creator: Balthasar Beschey
Inventory number: 6680
Made from material(s): wood, oil paint
Location: Alte Pinakothek
Genre(s): mythological painting
Depicts: Venus, Adonis

Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q29951564
Creator: http://www.wikidata.org/.well-known/genid/1bdf5fd527d403ccabd72fdd0ac1f6d7
Inventory number: 13261
Made from material(s):
Location: Alte Pinakothek

title: Paintings catalogue - benchmark
text:
Objective: Make a selection of nine paintings for the exhibition catalogue to be selected from Wikidata and rendered multi-format in Quarto.
The below Python code uses SPARQLWrapper to retrieve data from Wikidata based on a SPARQL query.
Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q203259
Title: The Fall of the Damned
Year: 1621
Creator: Peter Paul Rubens
Copyright: public domain

Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q568100
Title: The Descent from the Cross
Year: 1633
Creator: Rembrandt
Copyright: public domain

Wikidata link: http://www.wikidata.org/entity/Q571416
Title: Honeysuckle Bower
Year: 1609
Creator: Peter Paul Rubens
Copyright: public domain

title: Introduction
text:
This is a book created from markdown and executable code.
See Knuth (1984) for additional discussion of literate programming.




Knuth, Donald E. 1984. “Literate Programming.” Comput. J. 27 (2): 97–111. https://doi.org/10.1093/comjnl/27.2.97.

title: Summary
text: In summary, this book has no content whatsoever.
